GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1994 as the not for profit Andrew Jackson University (AJU), acquired by UniversityNow, Inc. 2010 and renamed New Charter University 2011, acquired by Global Heritage Education 2015, acquired by Bottega, LLC 2019 and acquired current title 2020.
Founded 1875 as Academy, acquired present title 1903. A private institution sponsored by the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints (LDS or Mormons)

AdmissionRequirements: Graduation from high school or equivalent, and College Board SAT or ACT examination
